search.title: Search & Discovery
search.resultsPerPageDesc: Number of items to load for each search result page.
search.showExplorerHubDesc: Display curated content like 'Trending' on the main explore page when not searching.
search.defaultSortDesc: The default sorting order for new searches.
search.rememberFiltersDesc: Automatically apply your last used media type and year filters to new sessions.

ui.title: User Interface
ui.layoutDensityDesc: Adjust the spacing of items in grids and lists.
ui.themeDesc: Choose how the application looks. 'System' will match your operating system's setting.
ui.languageDesc: Select the display language for the user interface.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Increases text and UI element contrast for better visibility.
accessibility.underlineLinksDesc: Makes all links underlined to distinguish them from text.
accessibility.fontSizeDesc: Adjust the global font size for better readability.
accessibility.reduceMotionDesc: Disable animations and transitions for a simpler experience.

content.title: Content & Hubs
content.defaultUploaderDetailTabDesc: The tab that is selected by default when viewing an uploader's profile.
content.autoplayMediaDesc: Automatically start playing audio and video when opened (not recommended).
content.defaultDetailTabAllDesc: The default tab to show when opening any item's detail view.
content.openLinksInNewTabDesc: All links to items on archive.org or other external sites will open in a new browser tab.

ai.title: AI Features
ai.enableAiFeaturesDesc: Globally enable or disable all features powered by Gemini AI.
ai.defaultAiTabDesc: Choose whether to see the standard description or AI tools first when opening a text item.
ai.autoRunEntityExtractionDesc: Automatically extract entities when opening a text document in the Scriptorium or detail view.
ai.summaryToneDesc: Set the style for AI-generated summaries.

data.exportAllDesc: Download a backup of all your settings, library items, and worksets as a JSON file.
data.importAllDesc: Import a previously exported JSON file to restore your app data. This will overwrite existing data.
data.importConfirm: Are you sure you want to import this data? All current settings and saved items will be overwritten.
data.importSuccess: Data imported successfully! The page will now reload.
data.title: Your Data
data.searchHistoryDesc: Clear your locally stored search history.
data.resetAllDesc: This will reset all application settings to their defaults. Your library and worksets will NOT be affected.
data.resetSuccess: Settings have been reset to default.
data.clearHistoryDesc: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your search history?
data.dangerZoneDesc: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone.
